thread.title: Man gets prison time in death of former Picayune athlete
thread.title_full: Man gets prison time in death of former Picayune athlete - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Man gets prison time in death of former Picayune athlete
text:
POPLARVILLE, Miss. (AP) - A judge has sentenced a 49-year-old Picayune man to 40 years for the murder of 21-year-old Dalton O'Meara, a former Picayune High placekicker.
District Attorney Hal Kitrell tells The Sun Herald ( http://bit.ly/1LRJ4qf ) Pearl River County Circuit Judge Anthony Mozingo sentenced Darin K. Galmiche Wednesday on a guilty plea to depraved-heart murder.
Kitrell says Mozingo ordered Galmiche to serve 20 years in prison followed by post-release supervision for 20 years.
The DA says Galmiche admitted he shot O'Meara with a rifle.
Information from: The Sun Herald, http://www.sunherald.com
